thread.section_title: PRO ISP omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av PRO ISP | www.proisp.no
thread.title: S. R. Weber
thread.title_full: PRO ISP anmeldt av S. R. Weber

author: S. R. Weber
title: S. R. Weber
text: At present I am managing about a dozen different websites, and I have used Proisp for more than half a decade. Before this time, I jumped from one webdomain and webhotel provider to the next, looking for quality. Proisp has not only delievered virus-free and superb 365 day stability but have also always followed up the humane contact level to precision, the few times I have requested support. Their "driftsmeldinger" (maintenance report) section of their site tells if there are any reasons for any delays, and, as said, these delays are few. These people love their work and set a standard other companies should strive to reach.
